---
category: news
title: "Americans Need Not Fear Artificial Intelligence"
excerpt: "We should not irrationally fear AI, or refuse to use AI-enabled capabilities. But we should be extremely cautious about granting extensive power to AI. Not because AI might wake up and decide we are the enemy (which is possible, but irrelevant), but because such a system is the poster child for a normal accident or system accident."
